title: JSON Schema for Application Mapping file

datasets.title: Collection of datasets.
datasets.description: List of datasets where source are located. The Migration Modeler will apply the applications' naming conventions defined in the applications mapping file to these datasets members.

items.title: Dataset name
items.description: Dataset where the source code (members) are located.

applications.title: Collection of application mappings.
applications.description: List of application meta information containing the existing naming patterns of members that are owned and managed for a given application. Used by the Migration Modeler.

application.title: The name of the application.
application.description: Unique name of the application (without blanks or special characters). Used to name the application directory.

component.title: (Optional) The component name of this application configuration.
component.description: Name of the application component defining a group of elements that belong together. Can be used to name the application directory in the repository path mapping configuration.

description.title: A description of the application.
description.description: Description of the application business context and purpose. This field is not used in automation tasks.

owner.title: The owner of the application.
owner.description: Application owner. This field is not used in automation tasks.

baseline.title: The version of the application.
baseline.description: Baseline version of the application. Used to initialize the application's Git repository and to create a baseline package.

namingConventions.title: The list of naming patterns.
namingConventions.description: A list of naming patterns or file names that belong to the application.
